body:
The `closed=` parameter to rolling windows is currently unsupported:

https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/reference/api/pandas.DataFrame.rolling.html

comments.body: Note that we support passing a pandas [BaseIndexer](https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/reference/api/pandas.api.indexers.BaseIndexer.html) object as the input to `rolling()`. Likely we could just reuse that to implement `closed=`.

title: [FEA] Implement `closed=` parameter for rolling window
